name: navbar
title: Navbar
description: Top navigation bar with brand and links

files.content: /** * Navbar Component - Site/app navigation header. * * @example * ```tsx * import { Navbar, Button } from '@orion-ds/react'; * * * * * * * Features * Pricing * * * * * * * ``` */ export { Navbar } from "./Navbar"; export type { NavbarProps, NavbarBrandProps, NavbarNavProps, NavbarLinkProps, NavbarActionsProps, NavbarHeight, NavbarVariant, } from "./Navbar.types";

props.name: colorScheme
props.description: Color scheme for text/links when using transparent or glass variants

examples.title: Basic navbar
examples.code:
<Navbar>
  <Navbar.Brand>Orion</Navbar.Brand>
  <Navbar.Nav>
    <Navbar.Link href="/" active>Home</Navbar.Link>
    <Navbar.Link href="/about">About</Navbar.Link>
  </Navbar.Nav>
  <Navbar.Actions>
    <Button variant="primary" size="sm">Sign In</Button>
  </Navbar.Actions>
</Navbar>
